#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

long long gcd(long long a, long long b) {
    if (a < b) {
        a ^= b;
        b ^= a;
        a ^= b;
    }
    while (b != 0) {
        a = a % b;
        a ^= b;
        b ^= a;
        a ^= b;
    }
    return a;
}

long long abs(long long n) {
    if (n < 0) {
        n = -n;
    }
    return n;
}

int main() {
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    long long x1, y1, x2, y2, gcd1, gcd2, fact;
    for (int i = 0; i < t; ++i) {
        scanf("%lld %lld %lld %lld", &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2);
        x1 = abs(x1);
        y1 = abs(y1);
        x2 = abs(x2);
        y2 = abs(y2);
        gcd1 = gcd(x1, y1);
        gcd2 = gcd(x2, y2);
        if (gcd1 == 0 && gcd2 == 0) {
            printf("YES\n");
            continue;
        } else if (gcd1 == 0 || gcd2 == 0) {
            printf("NO\n");
            continue;
        }
        if (gcd2 % gcd1 != 0) {
            printf("NO\n");
            continue;
        }
        fact = gcd2/gcd1;
        if ((fact & (fact - 1)) == 0) {
            printf("YES\n");
        } else {
            printf("NO\n");
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
